notes: Example configuration showing EMT with AEMT skills and Paramedic with some CCP capabilities

EMT.notes: Local EMTs trained to AEMT level minus advanced airways (King, i-gel). Can start IVs, give limited meds per protocol, acquire 12-leads.

Paramedic.notes: Paramedics can run vents and administer some critical care medications, but cricothyrotomy and ECMO are not in scope
